title: ZeeGee
blurb: Have you ever wanted to fly in VR? This experience allows you to float from area to area with the help of frisbees

team.name: Leonard Wedderburn
team.about: I worked on the tools management

content_html:
Inspiration

Zero Gravity

What it does

The player is able to float from area to area, they use their controllers like wings to guide themselves around

How I built it

Using Unity and Steam plugins

Challenges I ran into

Figuring out what to use the movement for

Accomplishments that I'm proud of

Creating a movement mechanic that is smooth and simple to use

What I learned

Breaking the rules in VR allows for creative possibilites

What's next for ZeeGee

Possible development into a full game
